source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.
source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts

items.title: Learn sculpture

visible_instructors.name: Francesca
visible_instructors.title: Francesca Dalla Benetta
visible_instructors.job_title: Escultora, Artista Plastica y Caracterizadora (Makeup FX)

items.headline: How to make a three-dimensional piece clearly and step by step.
objectives_summary: Learn from scratch to make a sculpture
To realize a three-dimensional piece modeled in plasticine or clay
Have knowledge about the use of materials suitable for the manufacture of a sculpture

items.title: Simple Sewing Skills: Sew French Seam & Making bias binding

visible_instructors.name: Ariike
visible_instructors.title: Ariike Ruban
visible_instructors.job_title: Pattern Maker, designer, dressmaker @ Ariike Sewing Studio

items.headline: Sewing French Seam and making bias binding
objectives_summary: Learn how to finish seams with a french seam
Learn how to stop raw seams from fraying without overlocking
Learn how to finish seams for delicate, transparent fabrics like chiffon, organza, netting etc.

items.title: Abstract Painting - Stained Glass Method
items.headline: An Easy & Fun Way to Create Abstract Paintings
objectives_summary: Create their own beautiful paintings using the method I demonstrate in the course.
Learn how a professional artist thinks about composition and design.
Impress friends and family with your new found skills.

items.title: 書道LEVEL 2: Mindful Japanese Calligraphy for Beginners 3-7/30
items.headline: SHODO by Nohoh-Method: The Complete KAISHO Style! Basic Srokes & KANJIs. WITHOUT Japanese Knowledge! Creative & Relaxed
objectives_summary: Be able to manage five basic strokes and learn 17 Ideographs (KANJIs) of Japanese calligraphy in Kaisho style
Learn the basic knowledge of the Japanese Calligraphy SHODO
Learn about the proper tools for SHODO and how to use them

items.title: ACRYLIC LANDSCAPES with a Painting Knife. Beginners Level 1

visible_instructors.name: Gerald
visible_instructors.title: Gerald Ashcroft
visible_instructors.job_title: Landscape and Abstract Artist and Teacher

items.headline: Paint a simple Landscape and learn how to mix Acrylics with a Painting Knife and just 3 Primary Colours and White.
objectives_summary: Paint a simple Landscape Impressionist style with a broad approach and 3 Primary Colours
Apply paint to your canvas using a Painting Knife technique
Compose and outline your landscape breaking it up into big shapes. No pencil no brushes!

items.title: Let's Color a Goblin with Procreate! Complete Color Process
items.headline: Follow along to learn a simple, but effective workflow from a pro colorist! Think Bob Ross...ish, with less hair.
objectives_summary: Students will learn a simple-to-follow digital coloring workflow.
Students will learn techniques for creating lights and shadows.
Students will learn how to create polished digital colors for line art.

items.title: Modnitsa Atelier Jewelry Design Intro Video Series
items.headline: Learn how to create stunning earrings and necklaces using semi-precious stones, crystals and gold-plated or silver wire.
objectives_summary: Learn the basics of jewelry design through wire wrapping and stringing
Learn about Color Theory
Learn about design through composition and pattern

items.title: Nail Art Course with gel painting
items.headline: This nail art course will inspire you and help you achieve artistic designs, full of elegance and refinement
objectives_summary: Decorating nails with painting gel
Draw

items.title: Beyond the Brush Fluid Acrylic Painting
items.headline: Discover New Techniques to Create Stunning Abstract Paintings
objectives_summary: Set up your workspace in preparation for the pouring techniques
Control the Fluid Paints to create aesthetically pleasing compositions
Crop & Stretch your finished abstract painting

items.title: Learn Modern Calligraphy with Brush Pens
items.headline: An introduction to how to write in modern calligraphy
objectives_summary: Modern Calligraphy with Brush Pens
Learn to write in modern calligraphy: the basics and beyond!

items.title: Floral Design 101
items.headline: Learn the Art of Floral Designing.
objectives_summary: The Flowers Industry
Learn about Real and Artificial Flowers
What is Floral Designing ?

items.title: Learn to Draw Mandala from Basics to Advanced
items.headline: Mandala art course
objectives_summary: Mandala Drawing
Mandala Art

items.title: Easy Origami At The Craft Academy
items.headline: I teach you how to make six easy origami pieces. Each piece has a video that shows you step by step what to do.
objectives_summary: Learn how to make six different origami pieces from start to finish. Using video I walk students through each step with easy to follow instructions.

items.title: Drawing for Beginners: Learn to Draw 8 Animals
items.headline: A Fun Class to Learn Drawing & Sketching Skills for Kids & Beginners. Great for Homeschoolers and Distance Learners!
objectives_summary: Learn basic drawing skills
Draw 8 beautiful and fun art projects by the end of this course
Learn a variety of drawing techniques

items.title: Watercolor Workshop for Beginners: Draw & Paint 11 Projects
items.headline: Learn How to Draw and Paint With Watercolor Paints. 11 Watercolor Painting Projects for the Beginning Artist. All Ages.
objectives_summary: Create 11 Dazzling Watercolor Paintings.
Participate in an activity that cultivates critical thinking skills, develops hand-eye coordination, and encourages self-expression.
Apply the knowledge gained in this course to create unique masterpieces.

items.title: Masterclass: Drawing, Design & Creativity with Color Pencil

visible_instructors.name: Ava
visible_instructors.title: Ava Moradi
visible_instructors.job_title: Art and Design Instructor, Professional Painter

items.headline: Learn all the basics and techniques, how to implement them in all your designs & drawings. Beginner to advance level.
objectives_summary: Following a new, original and effective teaching method called BTTVC: Basics, Techniques, Transfer your skills, Visualise and use your Creativity
Create and design advanced art in the simplest form that will stand out as professional artworks
How to draw in different styles to achieve realistic, expressive and imaginative drawings
